name: projecteuler.net
description: Solutions to the first 100 problems from [Project Euler](https://projecteuler.net/)

scripts.lint: npx eslint . --color --max-warnings=0 && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && npm run jest && echo 'Done.'
scripts.test:watch: concurrently -k -s first --names "LINT,TEST" -p "[{name}]" "npm run lint:watch" "npm run jest:watch"
scripts.update-all: npm install $(npm outdated | cut -d' ' -f 1 | sed '1d' | xargs -I '$' echo '$@latest' | xargs echo)

author: Gonzalo Diaz <devel@gon.cl>
